title: Tsuki ga Noboru made ni
synopsis: A father and daughter in Japan climb to the top of a ridge to watch the moonrise. As they wail, an old man tells them his story. An adaptation of Tetsuya Takeda's story about the relationship between a Japanese child and an American soldier.
staff: [['Yamamoto, Eiichi', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Kuzuoka, Hiroshi', ['Storyboard']], ['Takeda, Tetsuya', ['Original Creator']], ['Maekawa, Takashi', ['Special Effects']]]
